definition: household/dwelling/family/sb else's house/household business/house of woman's husband-to-be/CL:戶|户[hu4],家[jia1]
other people/sb else/he, she or they/I, me (referring to oneself as "one" or "people")
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
polite term for old woman or man
women (in general)
woman (derog.)
thrifty/economical
lit. the mouth that has been fed by others is soft, the hand that has received doesn't reach (idiom)/fig. one is partial to those from whom presents have been accepted
pinyin: chi1 ren2 jia1 de5 zui3 ruan3 , na2 ren2 jia1 de5 shou3 duan3
containing_words.word: 吃人家的嘴軟，拿人家的手短

definition: lit. the mouth that has been fed by others is soft, the hand that has received doesn't reach (idiom)/fig. one is partial to those from whom presents have been accepted
pinyin: chi1 ren2 jia1 de5 zui3 ruan3 , na2 ren2 jia1 de5 shou3 duan3
containing_words.word: 吃人家的嘴軟，拿人家的手短

definition: family of a functionary (i.e. educated middle class in Qing times)
Go your own way, let others say what they like. (popular modern cliche)/Do it my way.
pinyin: zou3 zi4 ji3 de5 lu4 , rang4 ren2 jia1 qu4 shuo1
containing_words.word: 走自己的路，讓人家去說

sentences.english: some drink from the fountain of knowledge, but he just gargled.
sentences.chinese: 人家暢飲智慧之泉，他只是拿來漱口了。

sentences.english: Bourgeois houses only began to spring up there twenty-five years later.
sentences.chinese: 有錢人家的房屋直到二十五年前纔開始在這裏出現。

sentences.english: Woman is the daughter of rich family, literature, everything terrible.
sentences.chinese: 女人是大戶人家的女兒，琴棋書畫樣樣了得。

sentences.english: The social worker had to deal with the poor family's mistrust of strangers.
sentences.chinese: 該社工人員必須應付這戶窮苦人家對陌生人的不信任。

sentences.english: Historically, the elite government officials are generally people with bound volumes of the family tree.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上，官宦人家一般都是採用裝訂成冊的家譜。

sentences.english: The interior decoration of this house is really good.
sentences.chinese: 這戶人家的室內裝修真是沒說的。

sentences.english: One day he sees a beautiful bell at the top of a door.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他看見一戶人家的門頭有個很美麗的鈴鐺。

sentences.english: Mr Brown boarded his son with that family.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生讓兒子食宿都在那戶人家。

sentences.english: You shouldn't always stare at others.
sentences.chinese: 你不要總是直瞪瞪地盯着人家看。

sentences.english: The seed corn was given me.
The flying hornbill represents our home state, Sarawak, taking us from Borneo to the host country, China, which is represented by the panda.
sentences.chinese: 犀鳥代表我們故鄉砂拉越，以及熊貓代表主人家中國。

sentences.english: A woman's work is never done .
sentences.chinese: 女人家的工作，永遠做不完。

sentences.english: She replied that it is not possible because of their old teeth.
sentences.chinese: 阿婆回答，老人家牙齒不好，沒辦法喫。

sentences.english: Can somebody else be rich, this also isf quote?
sentences.chinese: 可人家就是有錢，這也是福報？

sentences.english: Tell me, Huihua, how could people laugh when someone fell like that?
sentences.chinese: 慧華，告訴我，爲什麼人家摔倒了那些人還能笑出來？

sentences.english: If you can't help him, you'd better put him off.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不能幫忙，最好讓人家打消念頭。

definition: modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
other people/others/other person
but/however/(used for emphasis) indeed
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
variant of 咱[zan2]
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
maiden/unmarried woman/daughter
dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]
dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]/also pr. [sha4]
well-off/wealthy
(coll.) if
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
granted that/even if
(archaic) many/beautiful/how/old variant of 挪[nuo2]
surname Na
surname Nuo
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
variant of 哪[na3]
